description: M. I. Anvardeen and Others  Vs  D. K. Chandrakeerthi and Others before Hon.S.U.B. Karalliyadde, J.
parties: M. I. Anvardeen and Others  Vs  D. K. Chandrakeerthi and Others
keywords: Shrimp farm project,  Initial Environmental Examination,  Environmental Impact Assesment,  whether the permit issued under Section 14 of the Coast Conservation and Coastal Resources Management Act is illegal and ultra vires,  the Sri Lanka Coastal Zone and Coastal Resource Management Plan – 2018,  futility.
legistation: The Coast Conservation and Coastal Resources Management Act No. 57 of 1981 (as amended), the Fauna and Flora Protection Ordinance No. 02 of 1937 (as amended) and the Constitution of the Democratic Republic of Sri Lanka.
